Articles.Content: Wherever we have sliders, not just fuel tanks, we see a number next to the slider. I keep wanting to click on the number to type in a specific value rather than fuss with the slider up and down trying to get exactly ###.

I feel the exact same way. It just causes me physical pain when reading something like "107kN" when I want it to be a nice, smooth, even 100

Edited February 6 by Aerilon91
I agree, an incremental change of the value with arrow keys would be also a great addition.
Yes! This is deseprately needed! I keep dragging the slider, and it takes like 3 tries to get the amount I want. This would really improve the experience for me!
